product_overview: INNEXUS Landing Page is a premium, dark mode unified React-based landing page designed to position INNEXUS's brand and generate leads through a focused call-to-action for scheduling meetings. The style follows modern, minimalistic, and ultra-clean design principles inspired by brands like Linear, Vercel, and Raycast, ensuring a sophisticated user experience with smooth animations and responsive layouts.
core_goals: Communicate INNEXUS's unique value proposition with clarity and elegance
Drive user conversion primarily via the 'Agendar Reunião' CTA
Showcase portfolio sections and pricing plans effectively
Maintain a continuous dark mode visual experience for a premium UX
Ensure accessibility compliance and SEO best practices
key_features: Hero section with prominent badge, headline, subheadline, and dual CTAs (default and outline)
Posicionamento section featuring a strong title with a vertical line and concise paragraph in continuous dark mode
O que Criamos section laid out in a 3x4 grid displaying 12 minimalist titled items
Diferenciais section with three premium cards, each with a title and brief description, featuring subtle hover animations
Processo section showing five steps with large floating numbers and a discreet vertical connector
Projetos section showcasing five clickable minimalist cards, each with subtle border glow effects on hover
Planos section presenting three price plans (START, GROW highlighted, SCALE) with detailed features and CTAs
Final CTA section with a strong call phrase and scheduling button
Footer providing a minimalistic brand and basic information area
Smooth fade-up and staggered animations using IntersectionObserver
Continuous dark mode color palette implemented with TailwindCSS and HSL tokens
user_flow_summary: User lands on the Home page via React Router routing
Views the Hero block with immediate positioning and CTAs for engagement
Scrolls down to see Posicionamento delivering the brand promise with clear copy
Navigates through the O que Criamos grid to understand offerings
Explores Diferenciais cards with subtle hover highlights to grasp unique differentials
Learns about the Processo steps showcasing the working methodology
Clicks on Projetos minimal cards to see project highlights
Reviews Planos pricing tables and selects a plan pacing through CTAs
Engages with the final CTA to schedule a meeting via a clear button
Navigates to Footer for brand info and completes session
validation_criteria: Landing page maintains continuous dark mode without visual breaks
Typography hierarchy matches prescribed sizes (titles 48–56px desktop)
Animations implement smooth fade-up and stagger transitions consistently
O que Criamos section grid features 12 items with only titles, no descriptions
Diferenciais includes exactly three cards with subtle linear hover light effect
Performance benchmarks Lighthouse scores: Performance > 85, Accessibility (A11y) > 90, SEO > 90
CTAs interactivity tested with placeholder links ready for integration
Accessibility checked for AA contrast and semantic heading structure
SEO validated with unique H1 and section H2 headings
Responsive layout across desktop and mobile devices verified

features.name: Routing
features.description: Aplicação usa react-router-dom para rotas básicas, com Home como página principal.

features.name: Hero Block
features.description: Componente genérico de Hero com título, subtítulo e ações, estilizado para dark mode premium.

features.name: Animation Wrapper
features.description: Wrapper de animação baseado em IntersectionObserver para fade-up/stagger ao entrar na viewport.

features.name: Hook de Scroll Animation
features.description: Hook simples para disparar animação quando a seção entra em viewport.

features.name: Seção Posicionamento
features.description: Título forte com linha lateral e parágrafo curto em dark mode contínuo.

features.name: Seção O que Criamos
features.description: Grid 3x4 com 12 itens minimalistas, somente títulos, sem descrições.

features.name: Seção Diferenciais
features.description: Três cards premium com título e descrição, hover linear sutil e animação stagger.

features.name: Seção Processo
features.description: Passos 1–5 com números grandes flutuantes e conector vertical discreto.

features.name: Seção Projetos
features.description: Cards clicáveis minimalistas com borda #1a1a1a e brilho linear sutil no hover.

features.name: Seção Planos
features.description: Tabela de preços com START, GROW (destaque) e SCALE, CTA por card.

features.name: Seção CTA Final
features.description: Chamada final ultra-minimal com botão de agendamento.

features.name: Footer
features.description: Rodapé minimalista com marca e informações básicas.

features.name: Paleta e Tokens de Estilo
features.description: Tokens HSL e camadas base do Tailwind para paleta dark contínua.

features.name: HTML Base
features.description: Index HTML com fonte Inter e inicialização do app.
